title: (x) Sturdy Futura-esque condensed sans - Flyer Black Cn {Thomas Binder}
content:
Hello all

Myfonts suggested this is Futura Extra Bold Cond, but I don’t think the R is right. Any idea what this could be?

Sorry about the quality, that’s all I have.

M
